content: free starter pdf rounds 57 70 want the full pdf parts 5 6 rounds 57 84 it includes this free part https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/bougainvillea-part-5-and-6 video playlist https //www youtube com/playlist list=pl6-njmjb7yoiuyko9kik0z8zitmzqdfyi bougainvillea blanket part v enclosure of central garden | trellis rounds 57 70 in this chapter of the bougainvillea blanket we frame the central flower garden with a deep camel trellis and a soft wisteria puff garland preparing the piece for its future flowers and outer borders the 3d flowers that will climb over this trellis are worked in the next chapter of the bougainvillea blanket series this pattern includes written instructions for rounds 57 70 with step photos us crochet terms and a 5-language abbreviations appendix us uk es it pt skill level is adventurous beginner you ll practice front-post work working into earlier rounds building chained arches and keeping a large square flat format written pattern + step photos + 2 full video tutorials for rounds 56 61 and 62 70 yarn dk / light-3 weight acrylic or wool blend sample uses shades lapis wisteria and camel e g stylecraft special dk scheepjes colour crafter gauge 10×10 cm / 4×4 in = 20 single_crochet × 22 row 20 double_crochet × 8 row or similar fabric hook 3 5 4 0 mm e g or size needed for your gauge finished size of full blanket approx 140 × 140 cm after blocking when combined with previous and future parts this is part v of the bougainvillea blanket and continues directly from the earlier parts rounds 1 56 which are published separately support channel comments on youtube or email ravelry messages are not monitored for questions or feedback please write to psprovera@gmail com
